rooms.description: An open space designed with Scandinavian aesthetics. Features include minimalistic furniture and ample natural light.
Adjacent to the living room, offering a cozy dining experience with wooden accents.
Functional and modern Scandinavian kitchen design integrated with smart storage solutions.
Spacious bedroom designed for comfort and relaxation. Includes walk-in closet for convenience.
Well-sized bedroom with Scandinavian design principles, offering a calming retreat.
Additional bedroom maintaining uniformity in design and functionality.
A dedicated library space for study and relaxation. Features built-in shelves and ambient lighting.
Complementary guest bedroom with Scandinavian simplicity.
Functional and hygienic bathroom design incorporating sustainable water-saving fixtures.
Small but efficient space designed for domestic staff. Located adjacent to the main building to ensure privacy while remaining accessible.

openings.description: Large windows to maximize natural light and maintain the Scandinavian aesthetic. Oriented following Vastu principles for energy flow.
Sturdy door ensuring security while preserving minimalist design.
Functional window for ventilation and natural light, aligning with local building norms.
Well-insulated door to ensure privacy in accordance with Vastu principles.

vastu_considerations.description: The main entrance is positioned in the south-east direction to invite positivity and prosperity as per Vastu Shastra.
Bedrooms are oriented towards the north or east for beneficial energy flow, while the kitchen is placed in the southeast corner.

servants_quarters.features: Privacy with direct access to common areas

library_features.lighting: Ambient and focused lighting for reading
library_features.seating: Comfortable seating arrangements and study tables
